item.title: Coast to Coast v2.18.53.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 3, 2024

Coast to Coast v2.18.53.1 ATS

Changelogs v2.18.53.1
– Fixed a few bugs.

Requires all map DLCs
Compatibility: 1.53

Note: Make sure to place the map in correct load order or it will cause issues!

Credits: Mantrid

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MUO/Reforma Compatibility Patch v1.9.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 3, 2024

MUO/Reforma Compatibility Patch v1.9.1 ATS

Update v1.9.1
– Changed variants on some of the company prefabs in Phoenix to match the ones SCS put in the base map

Load order:

  • MUO/SN Compatibility Patch (optional) (ATS 1.47 and newer)
  • MUO/Reforma Compatibility Patch
  • Reforma Sierra Nevada Legacy (optional) (ATS 1.47 and newer)
  • Reforma map file
  • Mega Resources (ATS 1.43 and newer)
  • Either Minor Urban Overhaul or Lite Urban Overhaul

Compatibility: 1.53

Credits: defeoac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: H&W Iveco S-Way 2019 v1.3.6 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 3, 2024

H&W Iveco S-Way 2019 v1.3.6 ETS2

Mod Features
– 6 chassis included low deck
– EU and UK Interior
– 12 engines, including 3 LNG engines and badges
– All Iveco RAL colors
– 3 exclusive skins + template(skin and PNGs)
– Own Iveco sound by Kriechbaum
– More than 110 exterior parts
– More than 50 parts for the interior if you own the cabin DLC from SCS. ( Def for Cabin DLC is included)
– Completely new designed dashboard with 3 screens
– Compatible with signs on your truck, BC-Belka accessory
– Compatible with Interior Addon by Wolli (actually,y not all parts for UK Interior)

Compatibility: 1.53

Credits: GarageModding, H&W Trucks & Tuningparts

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.6 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | December 3, 2024

Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.6 ATS

Pack adds in traffic 258 sport and super cars:

AC 378 GT Zagato
Acura NSX(’05, ’17), Integra, RSX
Alfa Romeo 4C, 8C Competizione
Apollo Intensa Emozione
Arash AF10
Ariel Atom
Ascari A10, KZ1
Aspark Owl
Aston Martin One 77, DB9 (Coupe, Volante), Rapide, DB11, Vulcan, Vantage (’98, ’18), Virage, Vanquish ’01, DB7 Zagato, Victor, V12 Vantage, Valkyrie
Audi R8(’10, ’19), TT(’04, ’09, ’16)
Bentley Continental (GT ’04, Supersport ’10, GT ’18), Bacalar Mulliner
BMW i8, Z3(E36/8), Z4(E86, E89, G29), Z8, 8(G14), M3 GTR
Bugatti Veyron, Chiron, EB110, Divo
Chevrolet Corvette (’02, ’14, ’20), Camaro ’02
Chrysler Crossfire
Devon GTX
Dodge Stealth, Viper ’03
Donkervoort D8 GTO
Equus Bass 770
Falcon F7
Felino CB7
Ferrari LaFerrari, 612 Scaglietti, GTC4Lusso, California, F40, F50, Enzo, 360 Modena, 458 Italia, F430, F355, FF, 599 GTO, 348, 812 Superfast, 488 Pista, F12berlinetta, SF90 Stradale, Roma, 575M Maranello
Fiat 124 Spider ’17
Fisker Karma
Ford GT(’06, ’17)
Genty Akylone
Ginetta F400
GTA Spano
Gumpert Apollo N
Hennessey Venom GT
Honda S2000, CR-X Del Sol, CR-X ’91, Prelude
HTT Plethore LC-750
Hyundai Tiburon, Genesis Coupe(’10, ’13)
Icona Vulcano
Italdesign Zerouno
Jaguar XJ220, F-Type, XK(’02, ’10)
Kepler Motion
Koenigsegg One:1, CCXR, Regera, CC8S, Gemera
Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560-4, Diablo, Veneno, Aventador, Centenario, Murcielago, Reventon, Countach
Lexus LFA, SC430, LC500, SC300, RC F
Lotus Exige S Roadster, Evora, Elise(’99, ’05, ’17), Exige ’06, Espirit ’02, Evija
Lucra L148
Maserati Gransport, GranTurismo, MC12, Spyder
Mazda RX-7, RX-8, MX-5(’94, ’01, ’07, ’15)
Mazzanti Evantra
Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG GT, SLK(R171, R172), SL(R230, R231), SLR McLaren Roadster, AMG GTR, CLK63 AMG, CL55 AMG, CLK GTR, 190 Evo II
McLaren 570S, P1, 720S, F1, 12C, 675LT, Senna
Mitsubishi Eclipse(’95, ’03, ’12), Lancer Evo(III, V, VI, IX, X), Starion, 3000GT, FTO
Morgan Aero SuperSports
Mosler MT900
Nio EP9
Nissan GT-R, 350Z, 370Z, Z
Noble M600, M12
Pagani Huayra, Zonda
Panoz Esperante
Pininfarina Battista
Pontiac GTO, Solstice, Firebird ’02
Porsche 911(996 GT2, 997, 992), 718 Boxster, Carrera GT, Cayman(981, 987), 959, 944, 918, 968
Rezvani Beast Alpha
Rimac Concept One, C Two
Rossion Q1
Saleen S7
Saturn Sky
Savage Rivale Roadyacht
Sbarro Alcador
Scion FR-S
Scuderia Cameron Glickenhaus SCG003
Spada Vetture Sport Codatronca
Spyker C8 Aileron, C12 Zagato
SSC Ultimate Aero
Subaru Impreza WRX STI(GM, GD, GH, GV), BRZ GT
Suzuki Swift Sport ’12
Toyota Celica(’92, ’94, ’03), Supra(’92, ’98, ’19), MR2(’89, ’95, Spyder)
Tushek TS900 Apex
TVR Sagaris, Tuscan, Typhon
Ultima GTR
Vencer Sarthe
W Motors Fenyr Supersport, Lykan Hypersport
Wiesmann MF3
Zenvo ST1

All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.53.x
Included two versions: for use only with default traffic and for use with Jazzycats AI pack.
You must have in mod folder two files:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_base.scs
and
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_def.scs (only with default traffic)
or
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_jaz.scs (with Jazzycats AI pack)
If you want to have many sport cars everywhere use only one file:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_base.scs

Version 12.7.6 – update for patch 1.53

Credits: TrafficManiac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
